Articles.Content: Is there a known issue of a work around for when you cannot get a node for a mid course correct?  I only seem to have this issue with Interstellar flights.  I have tried to go to the Space Center and back and I still cannot create a node.  I have also tried to create one past the APO , but still no avail.

@gamerscircle Yesterday i was watching a popular twitch streamer playing stock KSP(no mods),he had the same problem.The game wouldn't allow to place maneuver nodes or "warp to here",until he passed the AP.
so apparently this is stock 1.1.3 issue

Is this it?

http://bugs.kerbalspaceprogram.com/issues/831

If it is, please update the bugtracker.
